#summary KML files for Spain (Spanish page)

= Catalunya =

Divisions provincials, comarcals i municipals de Catalunya en format KML: [http://tokland.googlecode.com/files/catalunya-kml.tgz descarrega TGZ].

Fonts:

 * KML de divisions comarcals i municipals a partir dels KML de [http://blocs.mesvilaweb.cat/marcbel/cat/1539/page/3 Marc Belzunces].

 *  KML de divisions comarcals obtingut a partir de les dades de [http://www.diva-gis.org/Data DIVA-GIS]. 

= Convert DIVA-GIS data to KML =

Files downloadable in DIVA-GIS are in SHP format, I used [http://www.gvsig.com/ gvSIG] to convert them to KML.
